title: Server Errors causing client crashes
body: My League Client froze shortly after hitting accept for a match. My friends said I was in champ select, shortly after, client crashes. Reloaded League and got an message saying "**Group Disbanded**" and "A server error occured and your group has been disbanded" this counted as a loss for me and took away one of my promo games. We all restarted computers and routers and tried again, same thing happened to my friend playing the next game, his resulted in LP loss. Are server issues occurring now?

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find any recorded service issues yesterday around the time you reported this. These server errors are usually caused by your client not being able to establish a solid link to the servers. As a first step, I strongly recommend working through the steps inside our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your ability to stay connected.
